TopicTitle: Any mods that make the exterior windows transparent?

Articles.Content: Are there any mods that make it possible to see inside the stock capsules from the external view. I assume it would require editing the models to make everything visible all the time (I think the interior/exterior is based on some kind of layer system, so the model designates which surfaces are only visible from exterior or IVA?)
Mod question, therefore moved to add-on affairs. Carry on.
I seem to remember that this has been achieved in modded command pods, but not necessarily stock.
